articles.title: Congratulations to Minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Congo
articles.content:
Congratulations to Minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Congo 
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Ri Su Yong on Aug. 12 sent a congratulatory message to Gakosso Jean Claude upon his appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Congo. 
					 In the message Ri Su Yong expressed the will to make all efforts to boost the bilateral relations together with Gakosso Jean Claude who has shown deep concern for developing friendship and cooperation between the two countries in various fields and wished him big success in his new job.

articles.title: Spokesman for DPRK NDC Warns Abe Group Not to Run Wild for Revival of Militarism
articles.content:
Spokesman for DPRK NDC Warns Abe Group Not to Run Wild for Revival of Militarism
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK Wednesday released a statement as regards the "statement to mark the 70th anniversary of the end of WWII" made by Japanese Prime Minister Abe on August 14.
					 Abe's "statement" on the 70th anniversary of the Japanese imperialists' defeat in the war should have been full of deep remorse and heartfelt apology for the bloody crime-woven past which inflicted tremendous damage and sufferings on the Korean and other Asian peoples, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 No sooner had Abe's "statement" been published than it aroused hatred and resentment of public at home and abroad.
					
					 Abe's "statement" is a blatant challenge to the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK, international justice and conscience of mankind as it concealed, curtailed and avoided the crimes from the beginning to the last.
					
					 Abe is a typical man of modern samurais who carried forward craftiness and belligerency and is accustomed to ultra-right reactionary idea as he is running the whole gamut of gimmick to bury the unprecedented hair-raising crimes into the oblivion of history.
					
					 Looking back on the past, what Abe buckled down to right after he became the driver of a militarist chariot running headlong into the road of reinvasion was to revise the constitution in order to totally deny the legal position of Japan as a war criminal state and defeated state which is unable to make any military threat or use and have army after the Second World War.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will certainly and unconditionally force the Japanese reactionaries, the sworn enemy, to pay thousand-fold price generation after generation.
					
					 If Abe does not want to face nightmare-like tragedy on this planet, he should bring his knees before the Korean people and mankind, unconditionally apologize for the unheard-of crimes and make honest reparation for them, showing his will in practice to prevent Japan from repeating the crime-woven past. 
					
					 This is the best way for saving Japan from running fast to ruin.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Should Be Buried in Cemetery as Soon as Possible: Spokesman for DPRK Organization
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Should Be Buried in Cemetery as Soon as Possible: Spokesman for DPRK Organization
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Joint National Organization of Working People issued a statement on Wednesday denouncing Park Geun Hye, a trouble-maker of the nation, for spitting out venoms in her "address marking August 15".
					 She said in an address the north must follow the change of the international community, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 What she uttered is nothing but sophism of a person without elementary faculty of judging her fellow countrymen.
					
					 What should be changed is none other than south Korea, a colony of the U.S. as it has to serve and follow the U.S. whether it likes or not, and Park Geun Hye as she is steeped in confrontation with fellow countrymen to the marrow of her bones.
					
					 What all the Koreans want and expect is to wipe out sycophants and traitors such as Park from the members of the nation to the last one.
					
					 Park also cried out for "purge". Purge is an essential means for the puppet forces to prop up their regime as they resort to repression and bestial suppression.
					
					 Park grumbled that the north is "wrecking peace and going against south-north integration" while not responding to the "proposal for dialogue".
					
					 If she had been sincere in her proposal for dialogue, she would have buckled down to creating an atmosphere for it.
					
					 From the outset of the year, Park and her group, however, have escalated confrontation totally going against the resumption of dialogue.
					
					 This time, she trumpeted about the inviolable nuclear issue of the DPRK once again. Not only all the Koreans but the world public regards the DPRK's nuclear deterrence as a treasured sword for protecting the peace of the country and security of the nation.
					
					 Only Park is denying this universally accepted truth.
					
					 She vociferated about the trite "north's deed" peppered with intrigues and fabrications. She unhesitatingly said that the north is "threatening security" through "cyber attack".
					
					 She wagged her venomous tongue to let loose a spate of invectives such as "provocation and threat" and to say the north will "invite isolation and ruin by itself".
					
					 It is Park who does not know even the conception of provocation and threat.
					
					 Though belatedly, she should study the conceptions of provocation and threat and acknowledge herself to have been a chieftain committing provocation and threat on this land.
					
					 She talked rubbish that "an opportunity is being given now", trumpeting about the July 4 joint statement.
					
					 We would like to ask Park who dared talk about the July 4 joint statement.
					
					 Does she sympathize with the principle of independence that calls for settling all the issues arising between the north and the south, large and small, from the stand of attaching importance and giving priority to the nation without dependence on foreign forces and free from their interference?
					
					 Does she approve the principle of peaceful reunification that reflects the patriotic spirit of protecting the living place of fellow countrymen from war disaster and guaranteeing the co-prosperity of the nation?
					
					 Has she willingness to accept the spirit of By Our Nation Itself and the principle of great national unity, which is the nation's mode of existence the key point of which is that division leads to ruin and reunification to powerful nation, and engine of improving north-south relations?
					
					 If she stands before the solemn questions of all Koreans, she will get ablush as she has so far become all the more hysteric going against all of them.
					
					 Resentful is that she talked crafty venoms as if she were interested in settling the issue of "separated families" which had already gone bankrupt. Lurking behind this is her ill purpose to calm down the people's mindset against her self-opinionated and shameless unpopular rule.
					
					 This time, she talked nonsense that she would create "world ecology peace park" in the Demilitarized Zone to make it a "new axis for realizing cooperation".
					
					 Nonsensical is her call for creating the "peace park" in the biggest hotspot in the world, where the worst confrontation persists and a war may break out any moment.
					
					 She also made all kinds of spurious remarks.
					
					 Explicitly speaking once again, she should set right the bad situation in south Korea before caring for and discussing the life of someone.
					
					 No matter how glittering make-up she may put, it is too late to prevent the foul smell from reeking off from her body interwoven with sycophancy, treachery, confrontation and hostility.
					
					 What she should do for the nation is to leave Chongwadae, the doghouse of the U.S., shut her unshapely mouth and get her crime-ridden body buried in the ceremony at an early date.

articles.title: DPRK History Society Discloses Japan's Crime Related to Ulmi Incident of 1895
articles.content:
DPRK History Society Discloses Japan's Crime Related to Ulmi Incident of 1895
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The History Society of the DPRK Wednesday released a memorandum denouncing the Japanese reactionaries  for trying to cover up the despicable crime of the Ulmi Incident of 1895 committed by the Japanese militarists and to evade the responsibility for it. 
					 Branding the Ulmi incident in which the Japanese militarists killed the Empress Myongsong in a brutal and cruel way as a hideous crime gravely violating the sovereignty of the Korean people, the memorandum went on:
					
					 At the time of the incident Korea was on the decline owing to the evermore intensified moves of the capitalist powers for aggression and the incompetent rule by the feudal ruling quarters. However, Korea was still maintaining its status as an independent state and exercising its sovereignty. 
					
					 As for Empress Myongsong, she was the then representative of the state power who was taking the helm of state affairs representing Emperor Kojong. 
					
					 The Japanese militarists stormed the imperial palace of an independent and sovereign state and cruelly murdered the Empress. This was a hideous crime against humanity as it was wanton violation of sovereignty of Korea and an intolerable infringement upon the dignity of the Korean people. 
					
					 By committing the Ulmi incident in breach of the basic principles of international law, the Japanese militarists sought to turn Korea into its exclusive colony.
					
					 The Ulmi incident was the state-sponsored terrorist crime committed by the then Japanese government. It was proved by all facts including the purpose of the incident, how it was carried out and disposal of the aftermath. 
					
					 The purpose was to block Czarist Russia's expansion of power toward Korea and realize the ambition for unchallenged domination. 
					
					 To this end, Japan tried to remove Empress Myongsong, head of pro-Russian group, to easily realize the ambition for aggression. 
					
					 After finding the murder of Empress Myongsong as the best way for changing the Korean feudal government's pro-Russia policy into the pro-Japanese policy the Japanese militarists planned to assassinate the Empress by the use of pro-Japanese element Pak Yong Hyo, the then minister of internal affairs of the Korean feudal government, through Japanese minister resident to Korea Inoue. 
					
					 Shocked by the failure of assassinating the empress, the Japanese government directly worked out a plot to kill the Empress in a bid to turn in its favor the policy for aggression of Korea that faced the crisis of total destruction. 
					
					 The whole process in which the Empress was murdered by Miura-led Japanese murderers fully proved that the Ulmi incident was cooked up by the Japanese government. It was also proved by what Japan did later to deal with the aftermath of the incident. 
					
					 The Ulmi incident was the brigandish crime showing brutality and shamelessness of the Japanese militarists. 
					
					 The murder of the Empress was the most brutal and monstrous one unprecedented in the history of the world. 
					
					 Its brutality and cruelty were proved by the eyewitnesses and testimonies of people in different countries who investigated the fact later. 
					
					 The then Japanese militarists also admitted its brutality and cruelty. 
					
					 The shamelessness of the Japanese militarists was fully revealed by the cunning moves they resorted to cover up the truth of the Ulmi incident and shift the blame for the incident on to Koreans. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the Japanese militarists tried to distort the fact to give impression that it had nothing to do with them under the foolish calculation to evade the responsibility for the crime. 
					
					 Later the Japanese militarists obtained the exclusive possession of all the historical materials of the Korean feudal government and removed all the records related to the killing of Empress Myongsong so that they would not be an object of future controversies as far as the responsibility for the incident was concerned. 
					
					 However, no fraud can cover up the historical truth. 
					
					 The Korean people will never forget the crime related to the Ulmi incident committed by the Japanese militarists but force Japan to make an apology without fail.

articles.title: Delegations of Overseas Koreans Leave
articles.content:
Delegations of Overseas Koreans Leave
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Delegations of overseas Koreans left here on Wednesday after participating in the conference for national reunification for celebrating the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 They included a delegation of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S., a delegation of the Federation of Koreans in Australia, a delegation of the U.S. Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and the chairman of the Council of Koreans in New Zealand.
					
					 Leaving earlier were a delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China, a delegation of the International United Confederation of Koreans, a delegation of the Joint Secretariat of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification, a delegation of the Confederation of South Koreans in Japan for Democracy and Reunification, a delegation of the Federation of Koreans in Canada and a delegation of aged officials of the General Association of Koreans in China.

articles.title: Slovenian Laibach Band Gives Performance Here
articles.content:
Slovenian Laibach Band Gives Performance Here
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The Laibach Band of Slovenia gave a performance at the Ponghwa Art Theatre on Wednesday.
					 The performance was given under the joint name of the DPRK-Europe Association for the Promotion of Cultural Interchange, the Traavik Art Company of Norway and the Laibach Band of Slovenia. 
					
					 Put on the stage were such numbers as world famous songs and songs on the theme of peace against war.
					
					 Performers showed well the artistic skill of the band through peculiar singing, rich voice and skilled rendition.
					
					 Korean song "Arirang" was also put on the stage.
					
					 Among the audience were officials concerned, people in Pyongyang, a European regional delegation for friendship and cultural interchange, diplomatic envoys, representatives of international organizations and staff members of foreign embassies here and foreign guests staying in the DPRK.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Give Helping Hands to Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Give Helping Hands to Korean Farmers
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Peter Wilson, secretary of the New Zealand-DPRK Society, and his party and members of a delegation of the Australia-DPRK Association for Friendship and Culture led by Peter Woods, did a friendship labor at the DPRK-New Zealand Friendship Sambong Co-op Farm in Phyongwon County, South Phyongan Province Wednesday. They participated in the international solidarity event for celebrating the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 They went round the room dedicated to the history of the farm after being briefed on the monument to field guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They helped farmers weeded vegetable field.
					
					 During a break they conversed with farmers and enjoyed dances of kindergarteners
					
					 They wished the farm greater success in the future, too.

articles.title: National Exhibition of Achievements of Young Scientists and Technicians Held
articles.content:
National Exhibition of Achievements of Young Scientists and Technicians Held
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- A national exhibition of achievements of young scientists and technicians was held here from Aug. 12 to 19 on the occasion of the Youth Day.
					 Displayed there were more than 3 740 valuable inventions and new technical innovation proposals.
					
					 During the exhibition the participants introduced their scientific and technical achievements and exchanged experience. 
					
					 A closing ceremony took place at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House on Wednesday.
					
					 Ri Song Ho, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the youth league, made a closing address.

articles.title: Exhibition of Scientific and Technological Achievements of Three-Revolution Exhibition House Open
articles.content:
Exhibition of Scientific and Technological Achievements of Three-Revolution Exhibition House Opens 
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The exhibition of scientific and technological achievements was opened at the Hall of Electronics Industry of the Three-Revolution Exhibition House with due ceremony on Wednesday. 
					 On display there were 1 220 latest and intellectual products and scientific and technological achievements of 600 kinds including IT, nano technology and bionics which were appreciated in the national festival of science and technology and several exhibitions. 
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were officials and employees of the Three-Revolution Exhibition House. 
					
					 Yun Yong Chol, president of the Three-Revolution Exhibition House, made an opening address. 
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants went round the exhibition.

articles.title: Koryo Songgyungwan University in DPRK Strives to Improve
articles.content:
Koryo Songgyungwan University in DPRK Strives to Improve Its Features
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The Koryo Songgyungwan University in the DPRK strives to improve its features as an educational unit training the talents conducive to the development of the country's light industry.
					 The university in Kaesong City, which developed from the historical Koryo Songgyungwan Academy after President Kim Il Sung visited it in May Juche 81 (1992), consists of such faculties and courses as Koryo insam, ceramics, textile and embroidery.
					
					 In recent years it has concentrated its efforts on establishing the system of training talents suited to the era of knowledge-based economy and the global trend of educational development.
					
					 Its new school buildings were built in Korean style in 2012, with a total floor space of 19 700 square meters.
					
					 The university pushed ahead with a work to put the education on an IT basis and set up new subjects.
					
					 And a signal progress was witnessed in improving the educational conditions and environment.
					
					 The teachers and researchers of the university have made valuable achievements helpful to the development of the nation's light industry.
					
					 They include a new insam-processing technique that helps keep raw insam for more than one year.
					
					 They also succeeded in further raising the quality of Kaesong Koryo Insam Liquor.

articles.title: System of Supplying Soya Milk to Children in DPRK
articles.content:
System of Supplying Soya Milk to Children in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Twenty-odd years has passed since  a well-organized system was established in the DPRK to supply on a regular basis soya milk to the children at nurseries, kindergartens and schools in the capital city of Pyongyang.
					 In the period, hundreds of thousands of tons of soya milk in total were supplied by exclusive vans, which ran a course of 16.1 million kilometers in total length.
					
					 The supply of nutritious soya milk for children has become a daily routine in the country, thanks to the loving care of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung saw to it that a foodstuff factory for children was built in Pyongyang and indicated the orientation and ways for specializing the production of nutritious milk. And he took a decisive step to make milk with beans in keeping with the country's conditions limited for stockbreeding.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il had always shown deep care for the production and supply of soya milk. He provided advanced equipment and facilities needed for processing the soya milk and took a measure to establish the traffic system for its supply. After all, the supply of soya milk to the children continued every day without letup even in the period of the Arduous March when the country was pressed hard for everything.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un visited the Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory in December Juche 103 (2014), stressing the importance to realize the modernization of the factory in a perfect way.

articles.title: Production of Herbivorous Fry Increases in DPRK
articles.content:
Production of Herbivorous Fry Increases in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The Taedonggang Fish Farming and Spawning Station under the Pyongyang City Fish Farming Management Bureau increases the production of herbivorous fry.
					 According to Director Pak Myong Il, the station has recently raised the production of fry, including silver carp, Aristichythys nobilis and grass carp, three times as compared with the same period of last year by introducing advanced techniques.
					
					 While deepening researches into the breeding of herbivorous fish, the station released millions of fry into Taedong and Pothong rivers in the capital city of Pyongyang.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. "2015 Flesh Traffic Report"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. "2015 Flesh Traffic Report" 
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- No sooner had the U.S. Department of State issued the "2015 flesh traffic report" than the international community refuted it. 
					 Naturally the "flesh traffic report" of the U.S. raised hot air against the U.S. together with strong rejection from the international community as it fabricated and slandered the situation of human rights in other countries, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a commentary. 
					
					 The U.S. talking about "flesh traffic" is a mockery of and insult to the international community, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is the world's biggest flesh trafficker and human rights abuser as it was built after horrible genocide and it has got corpulent through slave trade. 
					
					 The reason why the U.S. wields the "whip of human rights" is to use the human rights issue as a means for isolating and stifling those countries that go against its political interests. 
					
					 The U.S. is shamelessly styling itself a "judge" while issuing groundless documents related to human rights in sovereign countries every year. Its ulterior intention is to build the U.S.-led world order. 
					
					 It admits of no argument that the "flesh traffic report", worked out by the U.S. with no qualifications to talk about human rights, is the document of political fraud to internationally slander and pressurize those sovereign countries that do not kowtow to it. 
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to give up the wrong way of thinking and properly reflect on its own crimes if it wants to evade the denunciation by the international community.

articles.title: Minju Joson Urges U.S. to Opt for Denuclearization
articles.content:
Minju Joson Urges U.S. to Opt for Denuclearization 
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is openly challenging the unanimous aspiration of mankind who do not want another nuclear disaster on the earth and for this it has been denounced by the international community, Minju Joson Wednesday says in a commentary. 
					 The U.S. is the only country which used nuclear weapons and the biggest possessor of nuclear weapons in the world, but it has opted for nuclear modernization, not disarmament, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is wielding a nuclear stick in a bid to mercilessly trample down all the elements going against its interests and its implementation of world domination strategy. This bellicose hysteria and arbitrary practices gravely threaten the justice of mankind and world peace. 
					
					 It is not fortuitous that recently experts in politics in different countries commented that the DPRK's option of nuclear possession was very timely and correct. 
					
					 Highhanded and arbitrary practices threatening the right to existence is bound to meet strong challenge and counteraction. 
					
					 The more the U.S. intensifies its anachronistic hostile policy towards the DPRK with its ill-boding inveterate repugnancy to the latter, the more the DPRK will strengthen its anti-U.S. will and countermeasures. 
					
					 Gone are the days never to return when the U.S. could lord it over other countries and nations with a nuclear stick. The U.S. should clearly understand this and opt for denuclearization with sincerity.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Chief Executive's Confrontation Hysteria against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Chief Executive's Confrontation Hysteria against DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye, in a "Ulji state council meeting" at Chongwadae on Aug. 17, let loose a spate of  such war outburst as the "strong military posture" and "strengthening of forces for coordinated action to cope with crisis" while grumbling about the "provocation and threat" from the north. She also underscored the need to intensify drills with administration organs and civilians involved under the "simulation of war".
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary denounces this as an unpardonable challenge to unanimous aspiration and demand of all Koreans for detente and peace on the Korean Peninsula and the improved inter-Korean relations, and a reckless act of taking the lead in bringing clouds of a nuclear war to hang over Korea.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The meeting hosted by Park was a theatre for bombastic war agitation aimed to spread hostility and confrontation hysteria against compatriots across south Korea.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that a thick smell of fire that pervaded Chongwadae from the first day of the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills will sweep all other parts of south Korea and bring clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The situation goes to clearly prove that Park is the worst trigger-happy element who can not live even a moment without powder-reeking and a maniac who does stoop to any infamy to invite disaster of a nuclear war to the Koreans even by cooking up whatever fabrication to realize her ambition for invading the north.
					
					 If the puppet chief executive dares challenge the DPRK and makes efforts to fan up war hysteria, backed by the U.S., she would meet severe punishment by the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army.

articles.title: Peace on Korean Peninsula Called for
articles.content:
Peace on Korean Peninsula Called for
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- A meeting for achieving peace on the Korean peninsula was held in south Korea on Aug. 15 under the co-sponsorship of the People's Action for Peace against War and the Council for the Peaceful Unification of Tangun's Nation in south Korea, according to the south Korean internet paper Thongil News.
					 The chief researcher of the Sejong Institute of south Korea at a meeting called on the U.S., Japan and the present regime to make a switchover in their policy to the direction of reconciliation and peace from that of confrontation and war. 
					
					 The joint representative of the National Network of the Japan-South Korea People's Solidarity said that it is quite unreasonable for Japanese Prime Minister Abe to issue the "statement to mark the 70th anniversary of the end of WWII".
					
					 The representative of Japan's civic organization called for checking the strategy of "restoring Asia" that meets the interests of the U.S., and the Japanese and south Korean authorities' moves following it.

articles.title: S. Korean Women Demand Settlement of Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
S. Korean Women Demand Settlement of Sexual Slavery 
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Members of women's organizations in south Korea launched actions in demand of an apology and reparation by the Japanese government for sexual slavery for the imperial Japanese army, according to the south Korean internet paper Thongil News. 
					 The Women's Solidarity and the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps held a meeting for settlement of the sexual slavery outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul on Aug. 14. 
					
					 The statement read out at the meeting said that the Japanese government has beautified and denied the war of aggression and colonial rule and distorted the history even now, seven decades since the Japanese imperialists were defeated. 
					
					 It called for settling the issue of sexual slavery and making a peaceful world without violence against women and war. 
					
					 Prior to this, the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps held a meeting near the Japanese embassy demanding the Japanese government settle the issue of sexual slavery on Aug. 12. 
					
					 Kim Pok Dong, south Korean victim of the sexual slavery, called upon people from all walks of life to struggle to the last until the Japanese government probe the truth behind the sexual slavery and make an apology and reparation for it. 
					
					 Speeches were followed by information activities of pupils of primary schools in demand of restoration of the honor of the victims of sexual slavery and guarantee of human rights. 
					
					 At the end of the meeting the participants marched from the Japanese embassy to the Kwanghwamun plaza and the Seoul Square.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Calls for Stop to Anti-DPRK War Drills
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Calls for Stop to Anti-DPRK War Drills 
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Members of the Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy in south Korea staged a demonstration at the U.S. embassy in Seoul on Aug. 17, calling for a stop to Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills, according to the south Korean MBC.
					 On the same day, the U.S. imperialists and the puppet warmongers finally kicked off the war drills to make a preemptive surprise strike at the DPRK in all parts of south Korea despite denunciation and opposition of public at home and abroad.
					
					 The members of the solidarity put up a placard calling for a halt to the provocative saber-rattling and scattered leaflets denouncing the joint military drills as a war drill aimed at a preemptive attack on the north.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Congratulatory Message Posted on Website of DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Congratulatory Message Posted on Website of DR Congo
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's message of congratulations to the women football players who won the title of the 2015 EAFF Women's East Asian Cup was posted on the website of the National Committee of DR Congo for the Study of the Juche Idea on August 10.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Observed Abroad Its Features
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Observed Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- There took place events in different countries to celebrate the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 A meeting and photo exhibition were held in Cuba and photo exhibitions in Romania, Guinea and Nigeria on August 11 and 12.
					
					 Displayed at the events were photos documenting the exploits and revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were photos showing efforts of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification said in his speech that the President liberated the country and thus the Korean people could be freed from the fate of the Japanese imperialists' colonial slaves and enjoy an independent and dignified life as the masters of their destiny, state and society. 
					
					He went on:
					
					 The President brilliantly accomplished the cause of founding the party, state and army, resolutely frustrated the invasion by the U.S. imperialists, wisely led postwar rehabilitation and construction and socialist construction and built a powerful socialist country independent in politics,, self-supporting economy and self-reliant in defense.
					
					 He set forth the three charters for national reunification to provide the basic cornerstone for Korea's reunification and made great contribution to the cause of global independence.
					
					 Korea's reunification, desire of the President and leader Kim Jong Il, will be realized successfully under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea said:
					
					 The President devoted his all to building a genuine people's state on the liberated homeland.
					
					 Under his leadership, the peculiar socialist system centered on the masses and invincible socialist state could be built in the DPRK.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibition Opens in Russia
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibition Opens in Russia
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition opened in Blagobeshensk City, Amur Region, Russia on Aug. 12 in celebration of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were their works, books and photos introducing the true picture of the DPRK and handicraft associated with the talents of the Korean people. 
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 A vice-chairperson of the Amur Region Legislative Assembly said the liberation of Korea achieved by the people of the two countries 70 years ago at the cost of their blood provided a cornerstone for guaranteeing peace in Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 The delegate of the Russian Foreign Ministry in Blagobeshensk City of Amur Region said: Amur Region is a significant place visited by His Excellency Kim Jong Il in the last period of his life. I hope for a good fruition in the bilateral friendship and cooperation in this year of Russia-DPRK friendship.

articles.title: Romanian Organization Praises Kim Il Sung for Liberating Korea
articles.content:
Romanian Organization Praises Kim Il Sung for Liberating Korea
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Romania posted an article on its website "Juche Idea" on July 21 to mark the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The article said the Korean nation was freed from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule on Aug. 15, 1945.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea, achieved the historic cause of national liberation, the article noted, and went on:
					
					 He, who embarked upon the road of the revolutionary struggle for national liberation in his early years, put forward a line of armed struggle at the Kalun Meeting in 1930.
					
					 His line on liberating the country by the efforts of Koreans on the basis of the Juche idea and Songun idea through armed struggle made it possible for the Koreans' struggle for national liberation to advance along the scientific and right road with confidence.
					
					 He founded the anti-Japanese People's Guerrilla Army on April 25, 1932.
					
					 He organized the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland, the anti-Japanese national united front, on May 5, 1936 to rally broad sections of masses around the revolutionary army while strengthening the army.
					
					 He commanded the final offensive operation for Korea's liberation to defeat the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 His exploit of liberating Korea with Songun leadership will shine in the history of struggle for national liberation against imperialism.

articles.title: DPRK's Space Development Introduced by Russian Media
articles.content:
DPRK's Space Development Introduced by Russian Media
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The Aug. 10th issue of the Russian newspaper Pravda Primoriya allotted one whole page to an article titled "DPRK aspires after its own space flight".
					 The paper said that the DPRK registered a world-startling success without help of the EU and other countries advanced in developing space despite serious economic sanctions.
					
					 It stressed that the DPRK manufactured a carrier rocket by its own efforts and successfully placed satellite in its orbit.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Media of the Western and some other countries are resorting to false propaganda of branding the DPRK's policy of developing space as one for "threatening" the U.S. and Japan with "missiles".
					
					 Even when the DPRK succeeded in launching its first satellite, they let loose a spate of sophism that it launched IBM.
					
					 In order to deny such sophism, the DPRK organized foreign experts and reporters' visit to its satellite-launching ground in April, 2012 and opened its launching to the public and proved its transparency.
					
					 The DPRK succeeded once again in launching its satellite despite any sanctions and pressure of the U.S. and its follower countries.
					
					 This made it possible for hymns of President Kim Il Song and HE Kim Jong Il, the great leaders of the Korean people, to be echoed all over space.
					
					 The U.S. is mulling expanding its sanctions against the DPRK while propagandizing the latter's satellite-launching as the one for military purpose at any cost.
					
					 However, this further consolidates the position of the DPRK which successfully explored scientific research field for developing space by its own efforts.
					
					 The paper carried the content of an interview between a delegation of Partizansk City, Russia and officials of the National Aerospace Development Administration of the DPRK illustrated with a photo.
					
					 The paper Bremya Peremon Plus TV also conveyed the same content on Aug. 12.

articles.title: Portavoz de Departamento de Politica de CDN de la RPDC advierte a banda de Abe
articles.content:
Portavoz de Departamento de Politica de CDN de la RPDC advierte a banda de Abe
						
Pyongyang, 19 de agosto (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Departamento de Politica del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 19 una declaracion con respecto a la "declaracion del premier japones Abe en ocasion del 70o aniversario de la derrota de Japon en la guerra del Pacifico" publicada el dia 14.
					El documento aclara que la "declaracion" de Abe debia estar penetrada por la reflexion sincera sobre su pasado lleno de crimenes sangrientos que dieron incontables perdidas y sufrimientos inauditos al pueblo coreano y otros asiaticos.
					
					Pero, tan pronto como se publico el documento fue el objeto del odio e indignacion del interior y exterior del pais, senala el documento y continua:
					
					En su "declaracion", Abe oculto, disminuyo y evito invariablemente los crimenes cometidos, lo cual deviene el desafio frontal a la soberania y la dignidad de Corea y a la justicia internacional y la conciencia de la humanidad.
					
					Ese premier japones, que recurrio a todas las artimanas para encubrir entre las paginas obsoletas de la historia sus imperdonables crimenes en vez de pedir perdon, es el prototipo de samurais que heredo en el linaje de sangre la astucia y el caracter belicista y tiene como su credo politico la idea reaccionaria ultraderechista.
					
					Tan pronto como se sento en la silla del cochero del carruaje militarista que corre por el camino de la reagresion Abe se empeno, antes que nada, en la modificacion de ley para negar totalmente la posicion legal del pais criminal y pais derrotado que no tiene derecho a dar la amenaza y el uso de las fuerzas armadas ni poseer el ejercito despues de la Segunda Guerra Mundial.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea haran pagar sin falta de generacion en generacion cientos de miles de veces del precio de sangre a los reaccionarios japoneses.
					
					Si no quiere sufrir la tragedia de desaparecerse eternamente en esta planeta, Abe debe hacer disculpas sinceras sin falta por los crimenes sin precedentes ante el pueblo coreano y la humanidad y debe mostrar con la indemnizacion honesta su voluntad practica de no volver a repetir el pasado criminal.
					
					Esto deviene la medida mejor para rescatar a Japon que corre hacia la autodestruccion.

articles.title: Portavoz de CNOM exige castigar cuanto antes a Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Portavoz de CNOM exige castigar cuanto antes a Park Geun-hye
						
   Pyongyang, 19 de agosto (ACNC) -- En relacion con que la mandataria surcoreana Park Geun-hye, lata de la nacion coreana, volvio a soltar las calumnias a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en su "discurso de festejo del 15 de agosto", el portavoz del Conjunto Nacional de Organizaciones de Masas publico el dia 19 una declaracion.
					   Desde el comienzo de su discurso Park dijo que el Norte de Corea debe adoptarse al cambio de la sociedad internacional, lo cual no pasa de ser una sofisteria carente del juicio elemental sobre la parte connacional, revela la nota y continua:
					
					   Lo que debe ser cambiado es el Sur de Corea, colonia de EE.UU., y Park Geun-hye que esta colmada de la conciencia fratricida. 
					
					   El cambio que espera la nacion coreana es extirpar completamente de la lista de integrantes de la nacion a los vendepatrias serviles a grandes potencias como Park Geun-hye. 
					
					   Park hablo de la "depuracion". 
					
					   Pues, la depuracion es indispensable para el "poder" surcoreano que se mantiene por la violencia y la represion bestial. 
					
					   Park disparateo que la RPDC no acepta las "propuestas de dialogo perturbando la paz y nadando a contrapelo de la integracion de ambas partes coreanas". 
					
					   Si ella tuviera de veras la voluntad de hacer el dialogo, se habria entregado a la creacion del ambiente favorable al dialogo. 
					
					   Pero, desde el comienzo del ano nuevo hasta la fecha Park y sus compinches recurrieron a las maniobras conflictivas opuestas a la reanudacion del dialogo. 
					
					   Esta vez, ella cuestiono otra vez el problema nuclear de la RPDC. 
					
					   Toda nacion coreano y hasta la sociedad internacional reconocen el disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC como remedio todopoderoso para defender la paz y la seguridad del pais y nacion.
					
					   Solo Park niega esta verdad universal. 
					
					   Ademas, Park imputo a la RPDC la culpabilidad de los incidentes ocurridos en el Sur de Corea, lo cual es el metodo rutinario penetrado por los complots. 
					
					   Dijo sin escrupulos que la RPDC "amenaza la seguridad" con el "ataque cibernetico". 
					
					   Soltando sucesivamente las palabras como "provocacion y amenaza", disparateo que la RPDC "se busca el aislamiento y el arruinamiento". 
					
					   Ella es una tonta que no sabe ni la concepcion de la provocacion y amenaza. 
					
					   Aunque sea tarde, ella debe estudiarla y reconocer que ella misma es la autora de la provocacion y amenaza. 
					
					En cuanto a la Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio, ella dijo atrevidamente que "todavia se da la oportunidad". 
					
					Entonces, ?si simpatiza por el principio de la independencia que demanda resolver todos los problemas que se presenten en las relaciones intercoreanas en la posicion de dar prioridad a la nacion sin depender de las fuerzas extranjeras ni recibir la intervencion de ellas?
					
					Si reconoce el principio de reunificacion pacifica que implica el espiritu patriotico de defender el terreno de vida de la nacion desde los desastres de la guerra y garantizar la prosperidad comun de la nacion?
					
					Si tiene la voluntad de aceptar el espiritu de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" y de gran unidad nacional que es el modo de subsistencia de la nacion y fuerza motriz de la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas?
					
					 Ante tales preguntas severas de la nacion, ella se quedara ruborizada de verguenza por sus locuras conflictivas hechas hasta la fecha. 
					
					Lo mas indignante es que ella solto las sofisterias astutas como si tuviera interes en la solucion del problema de "familiares separados".
					
					Ella recurre persistentemente a la palabreria irreflexiva con el malsano intento de apaciguar a la poblacion indignada por las politicas antipopulares de caracter egoista y cinico.
					
					Esta vez, expuso la decision absurda de formar un "parque ecologico mundial de paz" en la zona desmilitarizada como un "nuevo eje de la cooperacion". 
					
					　Es ilogico crear el "parque de paz" en la zona mas candente del mundo donde perdura el estado de enfrentamiento y puede estallar la guerra en cualquier momento. 
					
					Park solto otros disparates agradables. 
					
					Antes de hablar o preocuparse de la vida de alguien, ha de arreglar la situacion miserable de la sociedad surcoreana. 
					
					Ya es tarde para embellecer su historia caracterizada por el servilismo a grandes potencias, la traicion a la nacion, el enfrentamiento y la hostilidad. 
					
					Lo que puede hacer Park para la nacion es retirarse de Chongwadae que sirve de perrera de EE.UU. y sepultarse cuanto antes en el cementerio publico.

articles.title: AHC revela crimenes de imperialismo japones, provocador de incidente del ano Ulmi
articles.content:
AHC revela crimenes de imperialismo japones, provocador de incidente del ano Ulmi
Pyongyang, 19 de agosto (ACNC) -- La Asociacion de Historiadores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 19 un memorando para revelar y condenar los crimenes sin precedentes de los militaristas japoneses que provocaron el incidente del ano Ulmi en el pasado y los viles actos de los reaccionarios japoneses que maniobran astutamente para evitar la responsabilidad al respecto.
					  El incidente arriba mencionado en que los militaristas japoneses asesinaron bestial y cruelmente a la emperatriz Myongsong es el crimen de gran tamano que violo gravemente la soberania del pueblo coreano, senala el documento y prosigue:
					
					  En aquel tiempo, aunque Corea estaba en el camino de decadencia debido a las cada dia mas fortalecidas maniobras de agresion de las potencias capitalistas y la gobernacion corrupta e impotente de la capa dominante feudal, mantenia la posicion del Estado independiente ejerciendo la soberania.
					
					  Para colmo, la emperatriz Myongsong fue representante del Poder estatal que controlaba los asuntos nacionales en representacion de Kojong tomando en su mano el Poder de Corea.
					
					  Los gangsteres japoneses asaltaron al palacio imperial de Corea y asesinaron cruelmente a la representante del Poder de Estado. Esto constituye el acto criminal anti-etico de gran tamano siendo la violacion violenta e intolerable de la soberania de Corea y la dignidad del pueblo coreano.
					
					  La realizacion del avasallamiento colonial monopolista de Corea fue el objetivo malsano que perseguian los militaristas japoneses que provocaron el incidente arriba referido violando gravemente a  los principios principales de la ley internacional.
					
					  El incidente en cuestion fue el crimen terrorista estatal provocado precisamente por el gobierno japones, lo cual se comprueba por todos los hechos incluyendo el objetivo y el proceso de provocacion y los trabajos realizados despues del incidente.
					
					  Japon provoco este caso con el objetivo de impedir la expansion de las fuerzas de Rusia zarista a Corea y realizar su ambicion de dominacion exclusiva.
					
					  Por eso, intento lograr facilmente su ambicion agresiva eliminando la emperatriz Myongsong, cabecilla de la fraccion pro-Rusia.
					
					  A fin de convertir la politica pro-Rusia del gobierno feudal de Corea en la pro-Japon los militaristas japoneses tramaron como mejor medida el asesinato de la emperatriz Myongsong. Conspiraron con Inoue, ministro japones en Corea e hicieron a al elemento projapones Pak Yong Hyo, ministro del interior del gobierno feudal de Corea, asesinar cautelosamente a ella.
					
					  El gobierno japones que recibio un fuerte impulso por el fracaso de su conspiracion, se vio obligado a tomar parte directamente en el asesinato para rotar a la inversa su politica de agresion a Corea enfrentada con la crisis de destruccion total.
					
					  Todo el proceso del incidente en cuestion cometido por los bandidos japoneses encabezados por Miura, comprueba indiscutiblemente que el incidente del ano Ulmi fue tramado y perpetrado totalmente por el gobierno japones.
					
					  Otros datos historicos demuestran tambien que el gobierno japones es el promotor del incidente del ano Ulmi.
					
					  Este caso demuestra a todo el mundo el caracter bestial y descarado de los militaristas japoneses.
					
					La barbaridad del asesinato de la emperatriz Myongsong se ha revelado por los testigos de aquel entonces y los investigadores extranjeros. 
					
					Hasta los militaristas japoneses de entonces reconocieron ese crimen atroz. 
					
					El incidente de Ulmi fue un tremendo crimen que demostro no solo la barbaridad sino tambien el cinismo de los imperialistas japoneses. 
					
					Con el calculo pueril de eludir la culpabilidad, los militaristas japoneses actuaron con astucia para tergiversar la verdad como si ellos mismos no tuvieran nada que ver con el caso. 
					
					Y despues, usurpo todos los datos historicos del gobierno feudal coreano y elimino los registros sobre el incidente de asesinato de la emperatriz Myongsong, de modo que no se presentara nunca mas la acusacion por el respecto. 
					
					Pero, no pueden ocultar con ningun fraude la verdad de la historia. 
					
					El pueblo coreano cobrara sin falta el perdon de Japon por sus tremendos crimenes incluso el incidente de asesinato de la emperatriz Myongsong.

articles.title: Efectuada en RPDC exposicion nacional de exitos cientificos y tecnicos de jovenes
articles.content:
Efectuada en RPDC exposicion nacional de exitos cientificos y tecnicos de jovenes
Pyongyang, 19 de agosto (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia de la Juventud, en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea tuvo lugar desde el dia 12 hasta el 19 en esta capital la Exposicion Nacional de Exitos Cientifico-Tecnicos de Jovenes.
					En la ocasion fueron presentados mas de 3 mil 740 invenciones y proyectos de renovacion tecnica, inclusive mas de 750 articulos en que se aplico la tecnologia informatica.
					
					Durante el periodo de exposicion, los participantes presentaron los datos de exitos cientificos y tecnicos e intercambiaron experiencias, mutuamente.
					
					La ceremonia clausural se efectuo el dia 19 en la Exposicion Permanente de las Tres Revoluciones.
					
					Ri Song Ho, vicepresidente del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung pronuncio un discurso de clausura.
					
					En el acto fue publicado el resultado general de calificacion.
